params.name: username
params.desc: The Keystore user that controls the X-Chain account specified in `to`

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user

params.name: to
params.desc: The account on the X-Chain to send the AVAX to.

params.name: amount
params.desc: Amount of AVAX to export as a {@link https://github.com/indutny/bn.js/|BN}

name: exportAVAX
desc: Send AVAX from the C-Chain to an account on the X-Chain. After calling this method, you must call the X-Chain’s importAVAX method to complete the transfer.
